about_the_game:
In Pizzeria, every tap brings you closer to becoming the ultimate pizza connoisseur! In this addictive clicker game, your goal is simple: devour as many pizzas as possible. Each tap on the screen consumes a slice, satisfying your cravings and boosting your progress. With various upgrades, you can automate your gameplay and enhance your pizza-eating journey.

You'll also receive random drops every 3 hours to expand your collection of pizzas!

Features:

  • Slice-by-Slice Devouring: Tap to eat slices and advance your pizza-eating adventure.
  • Special Item Drops: Discover surprises with unique item drops that add flavor to your gameplay. Can you collect them all?
  • Vibrant Discord Community: Join our lively where players share tips, strategies, and celebrate their achievements. Participate in regular events and exclusive item drops!
  • Become the Ultimate Pizza Devourer: Are you ready to claim the title? Start tapping now and embark on your delicious feast!

Join Pizzeria today and experience the thrill of becoming a true pizza aficionado! Will you beat your friends' scores?
